issues.description: [Ambiguous Instruction] Users may struggle to understand exact next steps. Evidence: Lacks specific, actionable steps for users unfamiliar with the project (Source: Redish, Task-Oriented Writing Principles)
issues.suggestion: Add more explicit, numbered instructions with expected outcomes. Before: "Get a working demo ASAP" → After: "Complete a functional demo in 30 minutes with these precise steps:"
issues.context: Get a working demo ASAP

issues.description: [Missing Context] Users cannot understand specific criteria for portfolio quality. Evidence: Vague description of what makes a project 'stand out' (Source: Nielsen Norman Group, Information Clarity Principles)
issues.suggestion: Define specific attributes of a standout portfolio project. Before: "Portfolio-ready project that stands out" → After: "Portfolio-ready project demonstrating advanced technical writing and analysis skills, including comprehensive documentation, innovative approach, and ..."
issues.context: Portfolio-ready project that stands out

issues.description: [Cognitive Load] Readers will struggle to understand the actual meaning. Evidence: Sentence contains multiple abstract corporate buzzwords reducing comprehension (Source: Plain Language Guidelines, plainlanguage.gov)
issues.suggestion: Simplify language, use concrete examples. Before: "Simply utilize Claude to leverage advanced features." → After: "Use Claude's AI capabilities to improve documentation analysis."
issues.context: Simply utilize Claude to leverage advanced features.

issues.description: [Undefined Jargon] Readers cannot verify or understand the claim. Evidence: No context or explanation of what these 6 responsibilities are (Source: Google Developer Documentation Style Guide)
issues.suggestion: List and briefly explain the 6 job responsibilities. Before: "Covers all 6 key job responsibilities" → After: "Covers 6 key technical writing responsibilities: Content Creation, Information Architecture, Editing, Style Guide Compliance, User Experience Document..."
issues.context: Covers all 6 key job responsibilities
